PDOSQLExecFormatterElement

A class to represent the nested <formatter> element for PDO SQL results.

This class is inspired by the similarly-named class in the PHPUnit tasks.

author

Hans Lellelid hans@xmpl.org
package

phing.tasks.ext.pdo
since 2.3.0
